html: (1 Nephi 20:19)."Thy seed also had been as the sand." Had Israel been obedient, she would have reaped the blessings of the Abrahamic promise of a posterity as countless as the sands of the sea or the gravel of the oceans. (Genesis 22:17.) Now, upon condition of repentance, she must await the future fulfillment of that promise.
